You're probably thinking‚Ä¶

‚ÄúSix hours? Is that even enough?‚Äù

Absolutely. We've designed this as a condensed, no stress experience that skips lines, avoids hassles, and guides you through Seattle's highlights ‚Äî food, views, and photos ‚Äî all with time to spare.

‚ÄúI don't want the stress of figuring out transportation.‚Äù

No stress at all. We handle the pickup, guide you through the city, and return you to the airport‚Äîzero guesswork.

‚ÄúWhat about my luggage?‚Äù

Easy. SEA Airport offers secure Smarte Carte storage. Simply check your bags before your tour begins, and we'll guide you every step from there.

‚ÄúI just want to taste, see, and feel Seattle‚Äîfast.‚Äù

That's exactly what we do. Local bites, skyline views, and iconic stops, all packed into a smooth, unforgettable layover.

Why It Works

Smart. Seamless. Unforgettable.

Most travelers waste hours stuck in the airport ‚Äî but not you!
Our guided Seattle layover tours transform downtime into a highlight of your trip. From airport meet-up and smooth transfers into the city, to curated stops and a guaranteed 2-hour buffer before your flight, every moment is stress-free.
You'll return with stories, photos, and a little Seattle gift in hand.

Your Seattle Six-Hour Journey

Choose your perfect Seattle layover experience

6

6-Hour Classic Tour

Pike Place & Waterfront

Discover Seattle's heartbeat in just six hours. Explore Pike Place Market, watch the famous fish toss, snap photos at the Gum Wall, browse artisan shops, and stroll the waterfront ‚Äî all with a friendly local guide.

7

7-Hour Extended Tour

Classic + Space Needle

Everything in the Classic Tour plus a quick Space Needle photo stop. Perfect for travelers who want both insider gems and Seattle's most iconic landmark.

8

8-Hour Premium Tour

Extended + Kerry Park

The ultimate layover adventure. Includes everything in the Extended Tour, plus a stop at Kerry Park for Seattle's postcard skyline view.
